@Junko Affairs  To be fair, I did see a fair amount of people watching the second season, but I think it's pretty reasonable that anyone forgot about it.  There's nothing wrong with a more complicated plot, but their release schedule was so weird, it became almost impossible to keep up with what was going on.  They released a new episode, what, once every two-three months?
@Junko Affairs you sound like you just discover stb 2 came out. maybe perhaps they don't gave a fuck because they already watch it?
